sentences.en: ...a worrying level of complacency about the risks of infection from AIDS.
sentences.cn: …对艾滋病感染危险的令人担忧的自满程度。

sentences.en: Complacency could easily result in tragedy.
Conceit and complacency are the archenemy of unity.
sentences.cn: 骄傲自满是团结的大敌.

sentences.en: Despite signs of an improvement in the economy, there is no room for complacency.
sentences.cn: 尽管在经济方面有改善的迹象，但仍不容自满。

sentences.en: Despite yesterday’s win, there is clearly no room for complacency if the team want to stay top of the league.
sentences.cn: 尽管这支球队昨天赢了，但要在联赛中独占鳌头，就不能骄傲自满。

sentences.en: Doctors have warned against complacency in fighting common diseases.
sentences.cn: 医生警告说，治疗常见病不能一见好就掉以轻心。

sentences.en: For courage -- not complacency -- is our need today -- leadership -- not salesmanship.
sentences.cn: 因为,我们今天需要的,是勇气, 而不是 自满 ;是领导人, 而不是推销员.

sentences.en: He had an air of complacency.
sentences.cn: 他脸上显出得意的神气.

sentences.en: I thought that our complacency had caught up with us.
sentences.cn: 我感到我们的自满情绪已使我们自食其果了.
洛先生告诫说不能自满。

sentences.en: Setbacks can be a good thing, forcing you out of your complacency.
sentences.cn: 挫折或许是件好事, 它可以迫使你克服自满情绪.

sentences.en: She warned that there was no room for complacency on inflation.
sentences.cn: 她警告说对待通货膨胀不能有一丝的懈怠。

sentences.en: Such complacency is costing the company dear.
sentences.cn: 这种自满情绪正使公司付出沉重代价。

sentences.en: The team manager has been quick to clamp down on the merest hint of complacency.
sentences.cn: 球队主教练很快就消除了自满的小苗头。

sentences.en: Today we're all playing the price for our complacency.
sentences.cn: 今天我们要为高傲自满付出昂贵的代价.

sentences.en: We must rid ourselves of complacency.
sentences.cn: 我们要去掉思想上的自满.
我们决不可产生自满情绪.

words.tran_cn: 满足地；自满地；沾沾自喜地

trans.tran_en: a feeling of satisfaction with a situation or with what you have achieved, so that you stop trying to improve or change things – used to show disapproval
